Message.Title: This stock is richly valued!
Message.Msg: The P/E is over 21 and growth is only 7 percent. Coca-Cola is a great company but not a good buy at these prices with a major bear market on the horizon. Price target 50 to 55 in the next 18 months. This is great time to short stocks with earnings about to plunge and a epic bear market to ravage the bulls.
